import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; const Nav = () => { const auth = useSelector(state => state.auth) return (
{ auth ? ( Home ): ( Flo )}
    { auth ? ( <>
  • Resources
  • Sign Out

  • New resource
    • ) : ( <>

) } export default Nav;
